Name: An audio sound which all the pieces make when moved
I want: A UI in which each piece generates a 1 second sound each time it is moved
So that: I enjoy playing the game and feel like I am playing a game. The audio adds entertainment value for me.
IMPL Details: Load a wav file into a class which extends Observable and load this wave file into each piece present on the board. When the piece is successfully moved, it will create a sound

Name: A tournament game mode
I want: A gamemode for 4 players to play Two players face each other on two boards then the winners from the previous boards face each other in the final board
So that: More players can play the game which adds more fun to the game
IMPL Details: A button labelled tournamentStyle can be pressed and then Player1 Player 2 Player 3 and Player 4 play the game on different instances of the board then the winners of the previous boards face off in the final. The winner is displayed in the UI.

Name: Suggested Moves Option
I want: A choice to see suggested moves a specific game Piece on the board
So that: Either challenge myself (by not using the suggested moves option) or use some help (by using the suggested moves option)
IMPL Details: A button specified as Suggested Moves Option on the start menu screen can be pressed to turn on or off the option for the duration of the game. If on then all suggested moves are the only valid moves

Name: Timer
I want: A Clock that shows how much time has elapsed
So that: This will help keep track of how long the game lasts for
IMPL Details: So there will need to be a GUI interface that the timer will be attached to. The timer object will be created using a singleton design pattern. Which would update the timer along the way, the timer will decide what would happen at a certain time.

Name: Restart Game
I want: A function that will allow a user to restart a game
So that: That start a new game could start
IMPL Details: A button labeled as restartGame which will reset the board to the initial state (i.e. how it appeared when the game started)

Name: Open Game
I want: A feature that will allow me to open a saved game board
So that: a saved game board can be played where it was left off
IMPL Details: A button can be pressed to open a saved board where the user will enter its file name
